name: Jeevananthan S

education.degree: B.Tech in Computer Science & Engineering (AI & ML)

projects.name: Hyper-Local Vector Control Architecture
projects.tech: Edge AI, TensorRT, NVIDIA Jetson, SegFormer-B0, Unreal Engine 5
projects.description: Designed privacy-preserving edge vision architecture to detect stagnant water. Proposed pipeline using SegFormer-B0 optimized with TensorRT for real-time inference on Jetson Orin Nano.

projects.name: Real-Time Groundwater Predictor
projects.description: Built a model to predict groundwater levels using DWLR sensor data. Achieved lower error rates than baseline linear models using XGBoost regression.

projects.name: Fashion-MNIST Image Classifier
projects.description: Built a CNN to classify clothing images and deployed it via a Streamlit web interface.

projects.name: Personal Finance Tracker
projects.description: Developed a containerized application for expense tracking with normalized database schemas.
